{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=TL-WDR4900 |revision=v2 |series=N900 |asin= |est_release_date=01/2013 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability=China only |type=wireless router |fcc_id= |pcb_id=2050500304 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9558;QCA9558-AT4A; |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model= |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5PS5162GFR-Y5C |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9558;QCA9558-AT4A; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=AR9580;AR9580-AR1A; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an |wi2_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Atheros |sw_model=AR8327N;AR8327N-AL1A; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=0C:72:2C |oui_eth=0C:72:2C }}
"2050500304" and "Rev:1.0" is silkscreened on the board.
*[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=42099 On the OpenWrt forums] (w/ bootloader log) :[[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9558-AT4A 3x3:3 WiSoC :[[Atheros]] AR9580-AR1A 3x3:3 5GHz radio :[[Atheros]] AR8327N-AL1A Switch
This device would appear to be using ''[[QCA]]''s AP135 reference design. :0C:72:2C OUI <!-- thanks for not censoring the barcode -->
